underlying_goal: Run a full end-to-end test of an 8-step automated workflow (STEP 1-8) for content registration across multiple CMS systems, then identify and implement improvements for error handling and performance
friction_detail: STEP 1 failed initially due to YudoInfo not being properly imported (lazy-loading scope issue), requiring a code fix and re-run; STEP 8 client timed out at 600s while server-side processing continued.
brief_summary: User requested a full STEP 1-8 workflow test, analysis of improvement opportunities, and implementation of fixes; the test completed (7/8 fully successful, STEP 8 partial), improvements were identified and implementation was started.
